text: Segariu (Segarìu) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 1,205 people lived there. Its area is 16.69 km².Istituto nazionale di statistica - Superficie territoriale per zona altimetrica It is 129 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Segariu
